items.summary: Create a DailyReflection component that displays a text area for writing notes for the currently selected date from the Calendar component, with a header showing 'एकत्रा' on the first line and 'वीर भोग्या वसुंधरा' on the second line, using the same warm earth-tone styling and mobile-responsive layout patterns as other components
Add backend data model and storage for daily reflections that associates a date with reflection text content, and implement public functions to save and retrieve reflection notes by date

Create React Query hooks in useQueries.ts for daily reflection operations (save reflection, get reflection by date) with proper optimistic updates, cache invalidation, and toast notifications for success/error states

Integrate the DailyReflection component into the DateDetailsPanel component so that when a date is selected in the Calendar, users can view and edit the reflection for that specific date alongside tasks and performance rating
